column4: Shanghai emerging frontrunner for Tesla's China production: Bloomberg
column5: Tesla Motors Inc  is eyeing Shanghai for its China production base in an investment that could be worth about $9 billion  Bloomberg reported.

column4: Shanghai emerging frontrunner for Tesla's China production -Bbg
column5: June 20 Tesla Motors Inc is eyeing Shanghai for its China production base in an investment that could be worth about $9 billion  Bloomberg reported.

column4: BRIEF-Panasonic to begin mass-producing components for electric-car batteries ahead of schedule - Nikkei
column5: * Panasonic will begin mass-producing components for electric-car batteries ahead of schedule at an American factory it is building with Tesla - Nikkei
